column2: "Leader, ideal timing. May Saika Hyouri and I accompany you on a mission?"
"To tell you the truth, Saika Hyouri and I are on very similar missions. We have found kindred spirits in each other."

"We seek answers...
And we believe that fighting as ARKS will bring us closer to them."

"So, Leader, we wish to follow you. It may seem a selfish request, but...
Will you cooperate with us?"
"I had a feeling you would help us, Leader. Please, take our Partner Cards."
